==== Notes ====
1. Sound not working after suspend

2. Network works with kernel patches or NDIS wrappers ( after blacklisting them in /etc/modprobe.d/blacklist )

3. Resolution should be 1280x800, but it only start in 1280x768.
In order to make it work it a new SIS video driver should be used: 
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=615094&page=3
